Detailed Description

template<int ArgumentDimensions, int ResultDimensions>
class imath::TISampledFunction< ArgumentDimensions, ResultDimensions >

Interface for a resampled function with a regular grid design.

template<int ArgumentDimensions, int ResultDimensions>
virtual istd::CRange imath::TISampledFunction< ArgumentDimensions, ResultDimensions >::GetResultValueRange ( int  dimensionIndex,
int  resultDimension = -1 
) const [pure virtual]

Get range of result value for the given axis.

Optionally some result dimension can be also specified.

Parameters:
dimensionIndexindex of argument dimension.
resultDimensionoptional index of result dimension, it can be negative if all dimensions are meaned.
Returns:
range of possible values, or invalid range if it is unknown.

Implemented in imath::CSampledFunction2d.
